name: Choco
description:
"Egg."

Choco lost his eggs. Help him find his eggs around the island! Though be careful, there's a couple of hungry folks around here...

Controls:

[WASD] - Move around

[E] - Interact

[Space] - Jump

[Shift] - Switch between walking & running

Gameplay:

Complete puzzles and just explore the island! There's a lot to find, we put a lot of effort into this project!

The Team:

Alexandro Di Nunzio - Director/Technical Artist/Programmer

Cindy Vu - Level & World Designer/2D Artist

Ramisha Wasim - 3D Modeler/UI Artist

Asset Credits:

Music: AR Timeless Love by WOW Sound

Font: Bahiana by Omnibus-Type

3D Character Models by Omabuarts Studio

*This is our capstone project for our final year at York University. Thank you so much for tagging along!*
